Combat
Hit Points: 91 Initiative: 1 Armor Class: 17 Attacks Per Round: 4
Armor Proficiency: Heavy; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial
Armor: Half Plate Shield: None Weapons: Greataxe (+8 1d12+2); Light Hammer (+8 1d4+2 R20/60); Rapier (+8 1d8+2); Shortbow (+9 1d6+1 R80/320); Unarmed (+8 1+2)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +20
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +3 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 Armor Class in armor
Improved Combat Superiority: Superiority Dice increase to d12
Improved War Magic: Increased War Magic effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Damage Adjustment: +2
Action Surge: May take an extra action 2/short rest
Combat Superiority: May use 6d12 Superiority Dice to perform 9 chosen Maneuvers/short rest
Commander's Strike: May spend a Superiority Die and forego an attack to use a bonus action directing an ally attack; ally uses Reaction to attack and adds Superiority Die to damage
Disarming Attack: May add a Superiority Die to damage and cause foe to drop an item (DC 16 Strength neg)
Distracting Strike: May add a Superiority Die to damage and to give Adv to the next ally attack against the same foe in the same rd
Eldritch Strike: Successful attack inflicts Disadv on saves vs. self spells for 1 rd
Evasive Footwork: May add a Superiority Die to Armor Class during a move
Feinting Attack: May spend a Superiority Die and use a bonus action to gain Adv on next attack on an adjacent foe and add Superiority Die to damage
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed weapon
Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting): May reroll 1s and 2s on two-handed weapon damage
Fighting Style (Protection): May use Reaction and shield to inflict Disadv on attacks on an adjacent creature
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Adds ability modifier to second attack damage
Goading Attack: May add a Superiority Die to damage and inflict Disadv on foe attacks on others (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 1 rd
Great Weapon Master: May use a bonus action to attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP/May suffer -5 attack w/a heavy weapon to gain +10 damage
Improved Critical: Crits on a natural 19
Know Your Enemy: Knows how foe compares to self after 1 min study
Lunging Attack: May spend a Superiority Die to gain +5' melee range and add Superiority Die to damage
Maneuvering Attack: May spend a Superiority Die to allow an ally to use Reaction to move half speed w/no OA from target and add Superiority Die to damage
Menacing Attack: May spend a Superiority Die inflict frightened (DC 16 Wisdom neg) for 1 rd and add Superiority Die to damage
Parry: May use a Superiority Die and Reaction to subtract Superiority Die + 1 from self damage by a foe
Polearm Master: May use a bonus action to attack w/polearm butt (inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning)/Foe entering polearm reach provokes an OA
Precision Attack: May add a Superiority Die to attack
Pushing Attack: May spend a Superiority Die to push a foe 15' (DC 16 Strength neg) and add Superiority Die to damage
Rally: Chosen ally gains Superiority Die + 2 temporary HP
Relentless: Has a minimum of 1 Superiority Die available after initiative
Riposte: After a foe miss, may spend a Superiority Die and use Reaction to attack and add Superiority Die to damage
Savage Attacker: May take the best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Second Wind: May use a bonus action to regain 1d10+20 HP 1/short rest
Superior Critical: Crits on a natural 18
Survivor: Regains 6 HP each rd when between 1 and 45 HP
Sweeping Attack: After a successful attack, may inflict a Superiority Die HP on another adjacent foe
Trip Attack: After a successful attack, may spend a Superiority Die to knock foe prone (DC 16 Strength neg) and add Superiority Die to damage
War Magic: May use a bonus action to make a weapon attack after casting any spell
Weapon Bond: Cannot be disarmed/May use a bonus action to summon weapon
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 7; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 8; Wisdom: 1
Save Notes: Indomitable: May reroll a failed save 3/long rest
Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 3; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 1 Attack: W: 10 Spell DC: W: 18
Spells:
Blur (W2 Illu): Foes suffer Disadv when attacking self for conc up to 1 min
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Disguise Self (W1 Illu): Self body and clothing appear different (Investigation detects) for 1 hr
Expeditious Retreat (W1 Tran): Self gains a bonus Dash 1/rd for conc up to 10 min
Leomund's Tiny Hut (W3 Evoc): Creates a 10' radius dome, impassable by objects and spells, for 8 hr [R]
Levitate (W2 Tran): R60' Target floats (Constitution neg) for conc up to 10 min
Magic Circle (W3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents choice of entry or exit (Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts Disadv on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by choice of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Message (W0 Tran): R120' Self and target may hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Polymorph (W4 Tran): R60' Transforms target creature (Wisdom neg; shapechanger immune) for conc up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
See Invisibility (W2 Divi): Self sees invisible and ethereal items for 1 hr
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (W1 Ench): R30' Target ROFL (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Unseen Servant (W1 Conj): R60' Invisible force (AC 10; 1 HP; Strength 2) moves 15'/rd and performs simple tasks for 1 hr or until damaged [R]
Magic Notes: Arcane Charge: May teleport 30' during Action Surge
